website_summaries.verdict: These grapefruit spoons are basic, but they get the job done.
pros: Serrated edges make scooping grapefruit sections easy
Solid and durable with a simple design
Works well to core strawberries and scrape cucumbers, too
cons: Handle can be uncomfortable when you're applying pressure to dig into the grapefruit

customer_reviews.title: They do more than help eat a grapefruit
customer_reviews.text: Since I can't eat grapefruit - why would I want this type spoon? These spoons do so much more: they're great for removing seeds/membranes from bell peppers; they easily clean out tomatoes for baking tomato cups; they help clean out cantaloupe, squash, pumpkin, etc. I seem to find different uses for them almost daily. These are sturdy with a beautiful shine. I've washed them many times since getting them, but they look as good today as when they were new! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diddy

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and a good length
customer_reviews.text: These are very satisfying. They are sturdy and a good length, the tips thin out nicely to be able to dig out those sections. I didn't feel any discomfort holding them and manipulating them to dig out my grapefruit. My parents had grapefruit spoons and knives so I grew up using these things. When I was in college I had roommates who somehow always had a grapefruit spoon but now that I am on my own, I had to get some of my very own, and I'm glad I chose these, they certainly do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Fanny V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I recently donated several sets of old silverware that were missing a piece or two, then purchased three new sets of matching silverware. What I didn't realize until I wanted to eat a grapefruit was that my new teaspoons were too wide and rounded to effectively cut into each section. I'm glad I was able to find these spoons! Not only do the serrated edges and pointed tip perfectly slice into even the most narrow of grapefruit sections, but the handles match my new silverware.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal Tan

customer_reviews.title: Too thick - expect some splatters...
customer_reviews.text: These are oddly “dull” serrated grapefruit spoons - the edge that’s serrated on the spoon is too thick so it just splatters juice everywhere when you try to cut into the grapefruit segments. You’d be better off using a butter knife... As grapefruit spoons they are completely useless, but they are still handy for de-seeding things like spaghetti squash or butternut squash (which is the only reason I’m giving them 2 stars instead of 1).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product was packaged very well and arrived in excellent condition. And they are perfect. I grew up in Texas and I have lived in Florida and California and I have visited many places in the world where they grow grapefruit and have used so very many different types of spoons and many of these have cost little to nothing and beyond reasonable and these work as well as the most I have ever spent for. They are perfect. I recommend this product to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great!! I was so thrilled to use these ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Great!! I was so thrilled to use these Grapefruit Spoon this evening for the first time. It was so easy and in no time at all I managed to eat the Ruby Grapefruit. I would highly recommend these spoons for anyone that enjoys eating Grapefruit. The serrated edges made a big difference. I am so happy to find the perfect Spoon for my Grapefruit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shabnum

customer_reviews.title: A little thick
customer_reviews.text: I personally like my silverware to be thin, especially when I'm scraping out grapefruit These are almost double the thickness I'd like. If you don't mind really thick spoons, (they are very sturdy and heavy duty) its a good value, but for me these are just too thick!
customer_reviews.author: Bookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: useless to me
customer_reviews.text: i been eating grapefruit for 60+ years, and i just got these "special" spoons for eating grapefruit. i guess i been doing it wrong all this time. i think these spoons suck, they tear up the fruit. and they just dont work for scooping out the last bits, like my favorite pointy spoon does. ima keep doing it the way i have been.
customer_reviews.author: ken inn

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Why don't standard flatware sets include these any more? I love to eat oranges and grapefruit using this type of spoon. These have the best tips I've seen in any such items (serrations are much more pronounced). The spoons are sturdy, and I can dig out all the fruit without worrying that I'll damage them. Clean well in a dishwasher; no discoloration in finish after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the spoons once, but they seem to be just what I was looking for. I actually bought them for eating mangoes and scraping the fruit away from the skin. I can't believe how much better these work compared to a normal spoon. And I'm sure I'll find other uses for them too. Great price and the quality seems high as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim J

customer_reviews.title: Don't eat grapefruit without one
customer_reviews.text: I never ate grapefruit until college. We poor college kids just ate them with normal spoons. That is a stupid idea. Buy these and love grapefruits. I don't know why grapefruit spoons are so expensive. But I thought these were a good buy. They are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These Rw exactly what I was looking for! They make eating my daily grapefruit so much more pleasant. They take some getting used to but I use them every day and love them. Not sir how people are “cutting their mouth” on these, they definitely aren’t THAT sharp.
customer_reviews.author: SoFloGal

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I order some from China years ago and still waiting on them? These showed up timely and where adorable..I enjoyed my grapefruit the moment they arrived!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I'm the only one in my house who eats grapefruit, so didn't need a whole set. I usually prefer a heavier weight with tableware, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: EricaJo

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves grapefruit, hence two grapefruit spoons. They look great, are a nice serrated teeth to them and work great for what they they were meant to d
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not great for scooping Grapefruit.
customer_reviews.text: Not great for scooping Grapefruit. They waste a lot. I rated it 3 stars instead of lower 1 or 2 because the problem could be my use of the tool.
customer_reviews.author: ncb

customer_reviews.title: This makes eating grapefruit easier
customer_reviews.text: This is the first I’ve ever used these and they work. It’s easier than cutting each peace of grapefruit with a knife but not as precise.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Helps 4-year-old granddaughter eat grapefruit!
customer_reviews.text: These were great for a 4-year-old to eat grapefruit and help make mom's life a little easier during breakfast. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Effective Little Spoon
customer_reviews.text: They work great for slipping into each grapefruit section by the rind after you have cut the sides if the section with a double bladed knife.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons make eating a grapefruit super easy. They are nice and thick and very well made. Can’t beat the price either.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and still working well after 3 years of use. They're not tarnished at all either. No complaints!

customer_reviews.text: These work great for eating grapefruit. The serrated edges do a great job in separating the grapefruit wedges. Very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable set

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Grapefruit lover in your home
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Grapefruit lover in your home. It works much better than a regular spoon and the little sharp edges really allow you to separate the delicious grapefruit from the skin/rind. A must have at a good price!

Looking for a better grapefruit spoon if anyone has a suggestion .....

product_meta.title: Chef Craft Serrated Grapefruit Spoons | Stainless Steel Mirror Finish | 2-Pack
product_meta.description:
Size:2-Pack

These grapefruits spoons have double serrated edges; making scooping out grapefruit segments a breeze. They are made of rust resistant stainless steel and are dishwasher safe. They are simple and can therefore fit in with many silverware sets.
feature_bullets: Serrated edges make scooping grapefruit sections easy
